description.zh: Teable 是一个基于 Postgres 构建的快速、实时的无代码数据库。它提供类似电子表格的简易界面，用于构建复杂的、企业级的数据库应用。该平台让开发者和非开发者都能轻松创建可扩展、安全且可定制的数据解决方案。
description.en: Teable is a fast, real-time, no-code database built on Postgres. It provides a simple, spreadsheet-like interface for building complex enterprise-level database applications. The platform empowers developers and non-developers alike to create scalable, secure, and customizable data solutions with ease.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 将专业数据库能力与无代码界面的易用性相结合
- 基于 Postgres 构建，具备良好的扩展性、安全性与性能
- 同时面向普通用户和开发者，兼具易用性与可扩展性
- 支持实时协作与数据管理
- 提供自托管选项，保障数据所有权

## 功能列表:

- 类似电子表格的界面，支持单元格编辑、排序、筛选、公式计算
- 数据聚合、分组、条件格式（部分功能即将上线）
- 多视图支持：表格视图、表单视图、看板视图、日历视图等（部分功能即将上线）
- 高性能支持百万级数据行操作
- 自动索引与批量数据处理
- 支持 SQL 查询，兼容 BI 工具和自定义查询
- 实时协作与权限管理功能
- 支持 CSV 和 Excel 的数据导入导出
- 即将上线：脚本扩展、自动化流程、AI 助手功能、多数据库支持
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Combines the power of a professional database with the ease of a no-code interface
- Built on Postgres for scalability, security, and performance
- Offers both user-friendly and developer-friendly capabilities
- Enables real-time collaboration and data management
- Supports self-hosting and data ownership

## Features:

- Spreadsheet-like interface with cell editing, sorting, filtering, and formulas
- Data aggregation, grouping, and conditional formatting (coming soon)
- Multiple views including Grid, Form, Kanban, Calendar, and more (some coming soon)
- High performance with support for millions of data rows
- Automatic indexing and batch data operations
- Full SQL support for integration with BI tools and custom queries
- Real-time collaboration with permission management
- Import/export support for CSV and Excel
- Coming soon: Script extensions, automation workflows, AI copilot features, and multi-database support
